constraint

Class ConstraintsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • constraint.ConstraintsManager

  • public class ConstraintsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all the MessagePublish constraints for the Broker. Configuration should be loaded by calling loadFromFile() or loadFromFile(InputStream) (The former reads from ConstraintsManager.DEFAULT_FILE).

    • Field Summary

      Fields

    • Method Detail

      • loadFromFile

        public void loadFromFile()
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.Exception
        Calls loadFromFile(InputStream) with the FileInputStream of the file ConstraintsManager.DEFAULT_FILE.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

      • loadFromFile

        public void loadFromFile(java.io.InputStream inStream)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.Exception

        Reads the constraints configuration from the provided InputStream and creates the appropriate Constraints, which will be later used when calling checkConstraints(MessagePublish,String).

        The format should be:

         [TopicName]
 {
   [constraint]=[value]
   [constraint]=[value]
   [...]
 }
 [TopicName]
 {
   [...]
 }
 [...]

        [constraint]=[value] might be something like length=5 or something like class=java.lang.String

        Parameters:
        inStream - The InputStream from which to read the configuration.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

      • loadTopicContstraints

        private void loadTopicContstraints(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lines)
                            throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Creates the constraints for a single topic according to the provided configuration. The first line must be the name of the topic.
        Parameters:
        lines - The lines from the configuration for a particular topic.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • checkConstraints

        public boolean checkConstraints(MessagePublish msg,
                                java.lang.String sender)
        Checks whether a MessagePublish should be rejected or not according to the constraints loaded from in loadTopicContstraints(InputStream).
        Parameters:
        msg - The received MessagePublish.
        sender - String representing the sender of the MessagePublish.
        Returns:
        false if the MessagePublish should be rejected, true otherwise.
